title: Death of Mercury
provenance_text:
Xavier Corberó [b. 1935], Barcelona, Spain [1]; purchased from the artist by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was included (no. 69, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. 
[2]. The sculpture was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on October 17, 1961.
